channel.title: Task Manager API
channel.description: API for user authentication and task management.

item.title: Register
item.description: POST - Register a new user (name, email, password)

item.title: Login
item.description: POST - Login with email and password

item.title: Get Current User
item.description: GET - Retrieve the currently logged-in user (requires Bearer token)

item.title: Logout
item.description: POST - Logout the current user (requires Bearer token)

item.title: Get All Tasks
item.description: GET - Retrieve all tasks (supports filtering, sorting, pagination; requires authentication)

item.title: Create Task
item.description: POST - Create a new task with title, description, priority, and end_date (requires authentication)

item.title: Get Single Task
item.description: GET - Retrieve a single task by ID (requires authentication)

item.title: Update Task
item.description: PUT - Update a task by ID (requires authentication)

item.title: Delete Task
item.description: DELETE - Remove a task by ID (requires authentication)

item.title: Health Check
item.description: GET - Verify API is running and healthy
